modName: Carbon's Retextures. SMIM Tomatoes - Ducks and Swans
summary: Options for darker textures for the SMIM red tomatoes and Ducks & Swans white swan.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][b]What is this

[/b][/size]Simply alternative textures for two mods that I like and use. SMIM and Ducks and Swans. I've made the SMIM tomatoes more dark than the original, and made the swans more dark as well. I personally found the red tomatoes a bit too bright and red, and some people have mentioned the swans being too bright. Hence this alternative texture.

I made this for my personal use, reflecting my personal preference. And thought I would make it available here, since people have asked for them. The original authors of the mods have been so kind to give permission for this.

[size=3][b]What does it do

[/b][/size]Installing this will replace the textures for those two models, the tomato and the swan. You can pick either one or both, depending on whether you use one or both mods, or want to replace one or both textures. Obviously you will need the original mods installed first in order to benefit from these retextures.

So for SMIM - get the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8655/?]original mod here[/url]
Ducks and Swans is found [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54679/?]right here[/url]

I'm offering two alternative textures for both models. The 'retexture' is somewhat darker, while the 'dark' retexture is even more dark.
I recommend using the 'retexture', but if you want an even darker tomato and/or swan, or have ENBs that mess up the lighting and color, you may want to use the other one.

Simply install the original mods first, then overwrite with my texture.

[size=3][b]Credits[/b]

[/size]Brumbek for his SMIM mod, definitely recommended
Stesha/Kaizit for the original swan model
Tamira for the Ducks and Swans mod, lovely mod that I can recommend
author: Carboniac
